name: Cocotober Games
description:
One of very first expérience with vidéo games
The goal was like the "Ink tober", to make a game on a single theme each day, i did 7 mini games based on different game styles.

The theme of each games :

1 - Dinosaur
2 -  King / Queen
3 -  Clouds
4 - Magic Potion
5 - Reptiles
6 - 3rd Eye
11 -  Labyrinth
